metadata.title: Lustless - Dating Beyond the Surface
metadata.description: Connect through meaningful conversation, not appearances. Verified users, no bots, no catfishing. Just authentic connections based on who you really are.

description.line1: Connect through meaningful conversation, not appearances.
description.line2: Verified users, no bots, no catfishing.
description.line3: Just authentic connections based on who you really are.

about.description:
Dating apps have become superficial. We plan to change that. 
We believe real connection starts with conversation, not swiping right.
Lustless brings back the excitement of getting to know someone for who they really are. Meet your soulmate not just a one night stand.

verifiedIdentity.title: Verified Identity
verifiedIdentity.description: Selfie and ID verification ensures every user is real and authentic

noPhotosFirst.title: No Photos First
noPhotosFirst.description: Connect through conversation - photos revealed only when you meet in person

zeroTolerance.title: Zero Tolerance
zeroTolerance.description: No bots, no catfishing, no fake profiles - just genuine people

services.description: Lustless combines cutting-edge verification technology with a unique conversation-first approach to create meaningful connections built on authenticity.

idVerification.title: ID Verification
idVerification.description: Every user verifies their identity with a selfie and government-issued ID, ensuring a safe and authentic community.

conversationFirst.title: Conversation First
conversationFirst.description: Chat and connect based on personality, interests, and values. No photos until you meet.

mutualReveal.title: Blind Date Reveal
mutualReveal.description: Photos are revealed only when you arrive at your pre-scheduled date location, creating genuine anticipation.

safeAndSecure.title: Safe & Secure
safeAndSecure.description: Advanced safety features, reporting tools, and 24/7 moderation keep our community protected.

work.description: Getting started with Lustless is simple. Verify your identity, create your profile, connect through conversation, schedule your blind date, and see each other for the first time in person.

contact.description: Be among the first to experience dating beyond the surface. Sign up for our waitlist and we'll notify you when Lustless launches in your area.

form.successMessage: Thanks for joining! We'll notify you when we launch.
form.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

email.subject: Welcome to Lustless - You're on the list!

welcomeEmail.bodyText: As soon as we launch, you'll be the first to know! For now, sit tight and think of all of the awesome conversations you'll have with your potential partners!
